member.name: T:Furcadia.IO.Paths
member.summary:
This class contains all the paths related to the users furcadia installation.
***NOTICE: DO NOT REMOVE***
Credits go to Artex for helping me fix Path issues and contributing his code.
***NOTICE: DO NOT REMOVE.***
Log Header
Format: (date,Version) AuthorName, Changes.
(Mar 12,2014,0.2.12) Gerolkae, Adapted Paths to work with a Supplied path
(June 1, 2016) Gerolkae, Added possible missing Registry Paths for x86/x64 Windows and Mono Support. Wine Support also contains these corrections.

member.name: M:Furcadia.IO.Paths.#ctor
member.summary: Defines the base path for the Furcadia Directory

member.name: M:Furcadia.IO.Paths.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the base path for the Furcadia Directory Throws FurcadiaNotFound exception if furcadia.exe cannot be found in specified path

member.name: M:Furcadia.IO.Paths.GetCachePath
member.summary: Get the All Users Application Data path for Furcadia.
member.returns: All Users Application Data path for Furcadia.

member.name: M:Furcadia.IO.Paths.GetDefaultPatchPath
member.summary: Find the path to the default patch folder on the current machine.
member.returns: Path to the default patch folder or null if not found.

member.name: M:Furcadia.IO.Paths.GetDynAvatarPath
member.summary: Get the All Dynamic Avatar path for Furcadia.
member.returns: All Dynamic Avatar path for Furcadia.

member.name: M:Furcadia.IO.Paths.GetFurcadiaCharactersPath
member.summary: Gets the location of the Furcadia Character Files
member.returns: A containing the location of Furcadia Characters folder in "My Documents".

member.name: M:Furcadia.IO.Paths.GetFurcadiaDocPath
member.summary: Gets the location of the Furcadia folder located in "My Documents"
member.returns: A containing the location of Furcadia folder in "My Documents".

member.name: M:Furcadia.IO.Paths.GetInstallPath
member.summary: Find the path to Furcadia data files currently installed on this system.
member.returns: Path to the Furcadia program folder or null if not found/not installed.

member.name: M:Furcadia.IO.Paths.GetLocaldirPath
member.summary: Find the current localdir path where data files would be stored on the current machine.
member.returns: Path to the data folder from localdir.ini or null if not found.

member.name: M:Furcadia.IO.Paths.GetLocalSettingsPath
member.summary: Get the path to the Local Settings directory for Furcadia.
member.returns: Furcadia local settings directory.

member.name: M:Furcadia.IO.Paths.GetRegistryPath
member.summary: Determines the registry path by platform. (x32/x64) Thanks to Ioka for this one.
member.returns: A path to the Furcadia registry folder or NullReferenceException.

member.name: M:Furcadia.IO.Paths.ProgramFilesX86
member.summary: Determines the registry path by platform. (x32/x64) Thanks to Ioka for this one.
member.returns: A path to the Furcadia registry folder or NullReferenceException.

member.summary:
Dream List Furcadia requires Clients to handle thier own Dream Lists See
http://dev.furcadia.com/docs New Movement for Spawn and Remove packets

As of V31, Color code has changed.

Balance the load to the server
Handles Throat-Tired and No Endurance

member.summary: Constructor

member.summary: Message to Server Event.

member.name: M:Furcadia.Net.Utils.ServerQue.QueueTick(System.Double)
member.summary:
Load Balancing Function
this makes sure we don't over load what the server can handle
Proxy has 2 modes of operation
Mode 1 Normal. handles Throat Tired syndrome with a time out timer to resume
Mode 2 NoEndurance. Send data to server as fast as it can handle with out overloading its buffer

member.summary: Loads an ini file and returns a key/value pair of values. (Note: It reads Key=Value pairs only.) (Add: Also the ini must be proper, one key/value per line. No section garbage.)
